content.raw:
I tried to compile ign-transport (default branch) following [this](http://ignition-transport.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation/installation.html#install-from-sources-ubuntu-linux) guide on system running Ubuntu 16.04

I am not able to locate "libignition-msgs-dev" dependency (E: Unable to locate package libignition-msgs-dev). I also tried to install [libignition-msgs-dev](http://packages.ubuntu.com/zesty/libignition-msgs-dev) along with [msgs0](http://packages.ubuntu.com/zesty/libignition-msgs0) and [protobuf10](http://packages.ubuntu.com/zesty/libprotobuf10) manually but again failed to compile with the protoc error (#error This file was generated by a newer version of protoc which is incompatible with your Protocol Buffer headers).

Any help will be appreciated.
content.html:
I tried to compile ign-transport (default branch) following this guide on system running Ubuntu 16.04

I am not able to locate "libignition-msgs-dev" dependency (E: Unable to locate package libignition-msgs-dev). I also tried to install libignition-msgs-dev along with msgs0 and protobuf10 manually but again failed to compile with the protoc error (#error This file was generated by a newer version of protoc which is incompatible with your Protocol Buffer headers).

Any help will be appreciated.
